short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tip people on Twitter with ENS usernames. Created by @yungwknd https://github.com/yungwknd/twitterenstipper

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension works with MetaMask, ENS, and Twitter to allow you to tip Twitter users with ENS usernames.

It is fully open sourced at https://github.com/yungwknd/twitterenstipper

Created by @yungwknd
